datasets.name: 84b0f875
queryLines:
SELECT 
concat("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Databricks-BR/wtsp_2025/refs/heads/main/logo_empresas/", logo_empresa) as link,
 * FROM luis_assuncao.handson.empresas_b_3

datasets.name: 42b4e325
queryLines:
WITH original_table AS (
    SELECT 
  DATE_TRUNC("DAY", `data`) AS data,
  AVG(`val_dolar_fechamento`) AS val_dolar_fechamento
FROM (
    SELECT * FROM luis_assuncao.handson.hist_dolar
) GROUP BY 1
  ),
  dates AS (
    SELECT 
      MAX(data) AS max_date_column,
      MIN(data) AS min_date_column,
      MAX_BY(val_dolar_fechamento, data) AS val_dolar_fechamento
    FROM original_table
  ),
  forecast_table AS (
    SELECT 
      data,
      val_dolar_fechamento_forecast,
      val_dolar_fechamento_upper,
      val_dolar_fechamento_lower,
      NULL AS val_dolar_fechamento
    FROM AI_FORECAST(
      TABLE(original_table),
      horizon => (
        SELECT
          max_date_column + MAKE_DT_INTERVAL(CAST(FLOOR(DATEDIFF(max_date_column, min_date_column) * 0.5) AS INT), 0, 0, 0)
        FROM dates
      ),
      time_col => 'data',
      value_col => 'val_dolar_fechamento'
    )
  )

  SELECT * FROM forecast_table
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    data,
    NULL AS val_dolar_fechamento_forecast,
    NULL AS val_dolar_fechamento_upper,
    NULL AS val_dolar_fechamento_lower,
    val_dolar_fechamento
  FROM original_table
    WHERE data < (SELECT max_date_column FROM dates)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    max_date_column AS data,
    val_dolar_fechamento AS val_dolar_fechamento_forecast,
    val_dolar_fechamento AS val_dolar_fechamento_upper,
    val_dolar_fechamento AS val_dolar_fechamento_lower,
    val_dolar_fechamento
  FROM
    dates
